price: 舍伊斯兰教而寻求别的宗教的人，他所寻求的宗教，绝不被接受，他在后世，是亏折的。
arabic: وَمَن يَبۡتَغِ غَيۡرَ ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمِ دِينٗا فَلَن يُقۡبَلَ مِنۡهُ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: waman yabtaghi ghayra al-is'lāmi dīnan falan yuq'bala min'hu wahuwa fī al-ākhirati mina al-khāsirīna
